verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
God of all grace has settled me, established me, perfected me.
God of all grace has strengthened me, lifted me
All glory to his name

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Halleluyah
Halleluyah
Halleluyah
Glory to God forever

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
All things are working for my good
All grace has made a way for me
Heaven has opened over me
I am blessed and highly favoured.
